title: Bug 116786: Library include does not store relative path.
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path.
OB: Currently, when including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the BIRT designer. 
2. Create a new report design. 
3. Include a library in the report design from a different location using a relative path. 
4. Save the report design. 
Expected result: The relative path of the included library should be generated and saved correctly in the report design.
